description: Supports iPad (3.2, 4.0)/iPhone/iPhone 3G/iPhone 3GS (4.0+)/Smart Mobile System/Nokia Symbian S60 System/Android System/Windows Mobile 6.0 3-in-1 multimedia wireless keyboard (Keyboard, TouchPad, Laser Pointer) Built-in rechargeable more staying power lithium-ion battery - Advanced lithium-ion battery charging shorter time and longer usage time Bluetooth wireless receiver includes, within 10M This is a handheld keyboard with back lit - With 26 PCS dazzling bright LED lights to help when using in poor lighting environments.
title: RII Mini Wireless Bluetooth Keyboard (Built-in TouchPad/Laser Pointer) - Black
